Welcome to LetsTireDire! Dire streams more with donations, so donate if you want to make him stream til he's too tired to go on! $12 adds one hour to the clock up to 12 hours! Extra time can roll over from Friday to Saturday, to Sunday too! Every cent counts!
Midas Magic, RandomAlternateStart, SkyUI
Dire makes a living off of streaming, so every weekend he streams LetsTireDire, where donations help Dire pay for bills, etc, and add more time to that clock, making him stream longer!
